title: Sticky toffee puddings
description: A deliciously easy and luxurious pudding for dinner parties and gatherings.Equipment: you will need 4 small pudding basins (dariole moulds)
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing the moulds
175g/6oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting the moulds
170g/6oz medjool dates, pitted and finely chopped
